title: Leona, why is it I can't always win with you?

replies.body:
I taught my friend's 1yo daughter to praise the sun. Now whenever I say "Praise the Sun!" she throws her hands up in the air and giggles.

You could say that I am passing on the teachings of the sun to the next generation!

All must PRAISE THE SUN!!!
I keep thinking of Dark Souls now whenever I see "praise the sun"
That's where it's from.

I know, just saying that because I've been playing a lot of Dank Souls lately.
I'm having a blast.
Im playing between dark souls 2 and bloodborne but I think dark souls 1 is my favorite idk whenever I use miracles in dark souls 2 it doesn't feel as strong as in dark souls 1

Yeah, idk. I like being the knight because I feel like an immovable wall, I just need to get my endurance up to be able to block almost anything.
My brother said that magic was more useful in dark souls 1 because the enemies weren't resistant to it from the beginning.
thats what happens when people complain about spells and miracles they get nerfed it just took another game worth of coding to do it.

basically in dark souls 1 the Lightning Spear and all its upgrade is the best spell you can get against every boss...that is the worst thing of the game, there is always an easier to defeat the bosses

the toughest ones (IMO) are bed of chaos ds1 (i sucked at jumpng to the center) and the dragon in ds2 (i needed to use the toe strategy)
That's probably because miracles got nerfed hard a few months after release for being absolute bullshit.
True that. It's a good game.
dark souls 3 hype
Maybe you should try praising the moon!{{champion:131}}

> [{quoted}](name=MoonMoon95,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6oVp3Ey4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-12-31T16:36:12.872+0000)

> Maybe you should try praising the moon!{{champion:131}}

http://img.ifcdn.com/images/5025fb64dd610c6825e1f1de7e354dc3ee5f75a2085ede65541bdfed099a2ecf_1.jpg
rekt
Calbel is love

B-but if I have both Leona and Diana in my team,
which should I praise and love? D:
You shall praise them both. For only when they come together shall the eclipse be born. . . .
-Rule 34 Leo and Diana intensifies-

And thus bring about the Equinox. 

Bonus points if Leona has the eye of Equinox.
New botlane meta: Leodiana.

Praise all the heavenly bodies!  They are all beautiful and worthy of worship.


That sounded a bit more Giggity than how I wanted it. . . . Oh well, PRAISE ON!!!

> [{quoted}](name=NommyPancake,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6oVp3Ey4,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-12-31T16:58:16.522+0000)
>
> B-but if I have both Leona and Diana in my team,
> which should I praise and love? D:

Diana.This is coming from a 2 1/2 Season Diana main. PEACE.
FUCK THE MOON! SUNLYTE FOWEVAR!
with Diana that's the point...
https://31.media.tumblr.com/f57c9e8abcc06c823679c0e0af6030a2/tumblr_mzh0hqMANs1qfaa86o1_400.gif
This give anyone else a seizure?

Do you even PRAISE THE SUN!!!!!

\ [T] /
PRAISE THE SUN!
Eh, many marksman just dont know how, or when to follow up on our awesome plays.

> [{quoted}](name=Darth Pixy Misa,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=6oVp3Ey4,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-12-31T20:33:23.652+0000)
>
> how

just attack
>  when

alwys

You think so, but you might (or might not) be surprised at the amount of marksmen who think getting three cs is worth more than a double kill. Especially heartbreaking if you manage to take down both of the enemies bot down to half health or less, with just the one combo. Stupid adcs.
{{champion:131}}  **TRIGGERED**
It's... so grossly incandescent.
You know you're praising the sun super hard when you can claw your way out of bronze playing support.
Because Thresh has the highest support+ADCwinrate, not Leona.
I must say,this image is GLORIOUS!
{{item:3460}} Praise it

you need to PRAISE THE SUN


..with your right hand
praise the sunbiatch
